name: East India Company
summary: In East India Company, players will enjoy building the World's most powerful trading empire & engaging in vigorous battles in both single player & multiplayer modes, all within a breathtaking cinematic game environment.

esrb.synopsis: This is a strategy game in which players assume the role of historical East India traders in the 16th and 17th century. Players' goal is to make their chosen company successful by trading from different ports, conquering certain ports, and engaging in naval battles with rival companies or pirates. During the naval battles, players can issue commands (e.g., fire canons, retreat, and attack vessels) from the deck level of their ship as the camera zooms in to track the constant cannon fire. Realistic sound effects include screams of pain, explosions, and shattering wood from the ship. The game logo in the menu screen depicts a pile of coins with red blood splattered over them.
